title: Internship Interview
Interview Descriptions: Asking about availability to work and own transport. Who is your referral and what is your expected salary and working hours. So far technical questions also being asked and whether can work for long hours and travel far.

title: ReactJS Developer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at YCS (Chennai) in Feb 2023
Interview Descriptions: Normal QA session and workout one problem. And the interviewer and multiple questions and asking abt ur current project details.. Also they giving me a array related problems if u can resolve this u will be getting a offer
Interview Questions: What is difference between spread operators

title: Senior Residential Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at YCS (Wall Township, NJ) in Dec 2021
Interview Descriptions: we did a phone interview followed by an in person interview . i met some of the staff and was given a tour of the facility. the staff was nice and welcomed me on board answering all of my questions
Interview Questions: tell them about a difficult experience with children

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at YCS
Interview Descriptions: Interview process was very easy. If you have the years of experience and the educational background there is nothing to worry about. Interview is very short and you hear back pretty quickly.

title: Case Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at YCS (Hackensack, NJ) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: the interview process was very smooth, 1:1 with a great supervisor. i was asked to speak about previous work experience based off of my resume. I was also asked if if i was willing to work evenings, conduct groups with the students, etc. I then was walked through the facility.
Interview Questions: i was asked to talk about previous work experience

title: Behavioral Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at YCS (East Orange, NJ)
Interview Descriptions: The hiring process takes some time and you have to fill out a bunch of papers. You get fingerprinted and you need 2 letters of recommendation. The interview was pretty easy going and they called me right after telling me that I received the job. The hr representative keeps you updated on what is going on with your application. After you are hired, you must attend mandatory training for one week, paid.
Interview Questions: How will you handle an individual that is angry?

title: SRT Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at YCS (East Orange, NJ) in Aug 2015
Interview Descriptions: You are given a short questionnaire about yourself. Then management comes in to go over your answers. You are given a quick run down on how the company works and are asked what would you do in situation questions.
Interview Questions: What would you do in a situation where you felt you needed help

title: Program Assistant Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 days. I interviewed at YCS (Palm Bay, FL) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: Send resume by email, I got a call 2 weeks later. When I went in for the interview I was asked to wait in the lobby. I was called in by the CEO and her assistant. They have a standard packet of tell me a time when questions. Be prepared to have examples.
Interview Questions: How would you handle an upset client

title: Residential Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at YCS in Dec 2011
Interview Descriptions: Easy.  You sit in a room with others and answer questions.  After you are done they usually call you right away is you got the job.  If not then you can email or call and see.  Sometimes they don't hire you right away but will later on.
Interview Questions: What would you do with an agitated client?
